summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 10.2°C), outside temperature (down 10.0°C), and inside temperature (down 1.7°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 13%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 389 m) and light levels (up 8505 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 21 miles), light levels (up 12857 lux), and cloud levels (up 274 m) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s cloud levels is 389.0m lower than yesterday, 260.3m lower than past week, 273.6m lower than past month.

Yesterday, cloud levels hit a low of 425m and a high of 1526m, averaging 564.0m; the past week and month reported somewhat higher averages.
cloud levels.summary: Cloud cover will be low, possibly causing overcast or foggy conditions.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; mild and pleasant. Also, dry and less humid conditions and gentle light winds are expected. A few light raindrops may fall, cloud cover will be low, possibly causing overcast or foggy conditions, and a mix of sun and clouds. No significant shifts in the weather are expected.
